content: plushy heart knit got a knack for knitting whip up a cute little plushy heart using your sock weight or dk scraps each heart takes less than 20gr of yarn and works up in only a few hours make one for everyone you love including yourself please note this pattern is worked using 3 double-pointed needles until the split for the tops then you ll need 5 needles for the body of the heart the front half is on needle 1 the back half is on needle 2 and the third needle is for knitting we use a locking stitch marker for the beginning of the round as you work your rounds you will need to move the stitch marker up sample shown damselfly dk weight top left dusk rainbow dk weight top right orchid mantis sock weight bottom right viva magenta dk weight instructions sizing and gauge
